definition: to hate to do sth/to hate to part with/to begrudge
residence
old variant of 捨|舍[she3]
surname She
to give up/to abandon/to give alms
(negative prefix)/not/no
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
one who is not prepared to risk his child will never catch the wolf (proverb)/(fig.) one who is unwilling to take risks will not achieve great things
pinyin: she3 bu4 de5 hai2 zi5 tao4 bu4 zhu4 lang2

sentences.english: If the teacher is a lamp, I'm reluctant to burning wick.
sentences.chinese: 如果老师是一盏灯，我就是舍不得燃烧的灯芯。

sentences.english: Memory is the hour of clothes, though no longer lares and useful.
sentences.chinese: 回忆是小时后的衣服，舍不得丢弃，虽已不再有用。

sentences.english: I know you couldn’t hurt a fly.
sentences.chinese: 我知道你连只苍蝇都舍不得杀。

sentences.english: He still lingered about after everyone else had left the exhibition room.
sentences.chinese: 别人都已经离开展览室了，而他仍舍不得离去。

sentences.english: I know you couldn't hurt a fly.
sentences.chinese: 我知道你连只苍蝇都舍不得杀。

sentences.english: Misers put their back and their belly into their pockets.
sentences.chinese: 守财奴宁可打赤膊饿肚皮，也舍不得掏腰包。

sentences.english: For protecting a son, the Wei is graceful beautiful only bear with, even the intravenous drops all loathe to give up a dozen.
sentences.chinese: 为了保儿子，韦雅丽只有忍受，连点滴都舍不得打。

sentences.english: I have not hid in the bottom of my heart, that is I a person's death.
sentences.chinese: 涐把舍不得都藏在心底，那是涐一个人旳天荒地老。

sentences.english: The reluctance to go home was not confined to wayward men.
sentences.chinese: 舍不得回家的并不限于任性的男客。

sentences.english: He often reluctant to spend more won't do extravagance.
sentences.chinese: 他往往舍不得花更不会做奢侈浪费的事。

sentences.english: She will grudge a penny even to the poor beggar.
sentences.chinese: 她连给最穷的乞丐一个便士都舍不得。

sentences.english: I also want to move on, but i cannt.
sentences.chinese: 我很想不等你了，我却舍不得走。

sentences.english: The mean man grudged the food his horse ate.
sentences.chinese: 那个吝啬鬼舍不得喂马。

sentences.english: Mother doesn't like to waste money and always eats her son's leftovers.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈舍不得浪费，总是自己吃掉儿子余剩的饭。

sentences.english: Snow promised to help, but four sisters to let the child suffer.
sentences.chinese: 白雪答应帮忙，但四妹却舍不得让孩子受苦。

sentences.english: Many of them remind me of my childhood. I feel myself unable to throw them away.
sentences.chinese: 好多东西都让我回想起我的童年，我舍不得扔它们。

definition: to be willing to part with sth
reluctant to part with (sth or sb)/unwilling to let go of
callous/heartless
to love dearly/to feel sorry for sb/to regret/to grudge/to be distressed
not to have room to put sth/to be unable to let go
to resign oneself to part with what one treasures
unexpectedly
to throw away/to throw out
to give away/to accompany/to see sb off
to suffer/fig. reluctantly
would rather/better
there is nothing to be done/one can't do anything about it
can't bear to
not reconciled to/not resigned to
to have the heart to do sth/to steel oneself to a task
useless
